title: Falling Art Ragdoll Simulator
description: Falling Art Ragdoll Simulator is a game where the more spectacular the fall, the higher the score! Dive into the hilariously absurd world of falling artistry, where watching ragdoll models tumble in ridiculous ways is oddly satisfying. Discover new characters, insane locations, and creative ways to break bones without consequences. Embrace your inner mischief-maker and revel in the chaos of this wild, safe-for-fun game!
